seniority_level.evidence: 12+ years of experience requirement strongly indicates senior level position

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' with focus on data modeling and architecture

sub_specialty.evidence: Title includes 'Data Modeling' and job focuses heavily on data modeling tools, database design principles, and data architecture

leadership_expectation.evidence: Mentions 'Build teams' and collaborative environment with technical expertise, but no explicit people management responsibilities

primary_cloud.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned in job posting, focus is on data modeling tools and database systems

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned at all in the job posting

processing_paradigm.evidence: No specific mention of streaming or batch processing, focus is on data modeling and architecture

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools mentioned, focus is on data modeling tools like Erwin and IBM Infosphere Data Architect

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions 'data warehousing concepts' which suggests warehouse focus, though no specific warehouse platforms mentioned

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Pune, Maharashtra, India with no remote work options mentioned

timezone_focus.evidence: Location specified as Pune, India which implies IST timezone focus

relocation_required.evidence: Location already specified as Pune, no relocation assistance or requirements mentioned

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned and this is an India-based position where H1B wouldn't apply

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No work authorization requirements mentioned and this is an India-based position

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirements mentioned for this India-based position

w2_vs_1099.evidence: This appears to be a standard full-time employee position at IBM, not a contract role

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits mentioned in the job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career growth, advancement, or development opportunities mentioned

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions working in collaborative environment 'partnering with other scientists, engineers, consultants' which implies learning from experienced team members

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion or advancement path mentioned in job posting

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No internal mobility, transfers, or role changes mentioned

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks or advancement paths mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: 12+ years experience requirement is quite high, clear 'Required Technical And Professional Expertise' section with strict qualifications

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined role focused specifically on data modeling with clear responsibilities and requirements

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 12+ years for senior data modeling role with specific tools (Erwin, IBM Infosphere) seems reasonable, no obvious skill inflation
